abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Vanish
abilities.description: Vanish from sight, becoming Stealthed, gaining 20% Movement Speed and access to new Abilities. For the first second, Valeera is Unrevealable and can pass through other units. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.  After being Stealthed for 3 seconds, Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote have 100% increased range, and cause Valeera to teleport to the target when used.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Eviscerate
abilities.description: Eviscerate an enemy, dealing damage per Combo Point.  1 Point: 85 (+4% per level) 2 Points: 170 (+4% per level) 3 Points: 255 (+4% per level)  Stealth: Garrote Silence and damage an enemy over time.

abilities.name: E2
abilities.title: Garrote
abilities.description: Deal 20 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage over 7 seconds, and Silence them for 2.5 seconds.  Awards 1 Combo Point.  Unstealth: Eviscerate High damage finishing move.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Sinister Strike
abilities.description: Dash forward, hitting all enemies in a line for 110 (+4% per level) damage. If Sinister Strike hits a Hero, Valeera stops dashing immediately and the cooldown is reduced to 1 second.  Awards 1 Combo Point.  Stealth: Ambush Heavily damage an enemy and reduce their Armor.

abilities.name: Q2
abilities.title: Ambush
abilities.description: Ambush an enemy, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage and reducing their Armor by 10 for 5 seconds.  Awards 1 Combo Point.  Unstealth: Sinister Strike Dash forward, damaging enemies.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Cloak of Shadows
abilities.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Smoke Bomb
abilities.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 30 Armor, reducing damage taken by 30%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Blade Flurry
abilities.description: Deal 130 (+4% per level) damage in an area around Valeera.  Awards 1 Combo Point per enemy Hero hit.  Stealth: Cheap Shot Stun, Blind, and damage an enemy.

abilities.name: W2
abilities.title: Cheap Shot
abilities.description: Deal 30 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy, Stun them for 0.75 seconds, and Blind them for 2 seconds once Cheap Shot's Stun expires.  Awards 1 Combo Point.  Unstealth: Blade Flurry Deal damage in an area around Valeera.

talents.name: ValeeraVigor
talents.title: Vigor
talents.description: Valeera regenerates an additional 3 Energy per second.  Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.

talents.name: ValeeraVanishSubtlety
talents.title: Subtlety
talents.description: After teleporting with Ambush, Cheap Shot, or Garrote, regenerate 10 Energy per second for 5 seconds.

talents.name: ValeeraCombatReadiness
talents.title: Combat Readiness
talents.description: Each Combo Point spent grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.

talents.name: ValeeraCripplingPoison
talents.title: Crippling Poison
talents.description: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds Slow targets by 20% for 4 seconds.  Activating Crippling Poison does not break Stealth.

talents.name: ValeeraSinisterStrikeRelentlessStrikes
talents.title: Relentless Strikes
talents.description: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by 15.

talents.name: ValeeraGarroteHemorrhage
talents.title: Hemorrhage
talents.description: Valeera's Basic Attacks deal 40% additional damage to enemies affected by Garrote.

talents.name: ValeeraVanishInitiative
talents.title: Initiative
talents.description: Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote grant 15% Movement Speed for 3 seconds and award 2 Combo Points.

talents.name: ValeeraWoundPoison
talents.title: Wound Poison
talents.description: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds reduce enemy healing received by 50% for 4 seconds.  Activating Wound Poison does not break Stealth.

talents.name: ValeeraSinisterStrikeMutilate
talents.title: Mutilate
talents.description: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing 125% additional damage, but its range is reduced by 1.

talents.name: ValeeraBladeFlurryFatalFinesse
talents.title: Fatal Finesse
talents.description: Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 6, up to 90.  Reward: After damaging 15 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20.

talents.name: ValeeraEviscerateSliceAndDice
talents.title: Slice and Dice
talents.description: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points grants 150% Attack Speed. Lasts 3 seconds or 3 Basic Attacks.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 2 Energy.

talents.name: ValeeraSmokeBomb
talents.title: Smoke Bomb
talents.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 30 Armor, reducing damage taken by 30%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

talents.name: ValeeraCloakOfShadows
talents.title: Cloak of Shadows
talents.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

talents.name: ValeeraAmbushDeathFromAbove
talents.title: Death From Above
talents.description: Teleporting with Ambush reduces the cooldown of Vanish by 4 seconds.

talents.name: ValeeraCheapShotBlind
talents.title: Blind
talents.description: Increase the duration of Cheap Shot's Blind by 2.5 seconds.

talents.name: ValeeraGarroteStrangle
talents.title: Strangle
talents.description: Using Garrote on a Hero reduces their Spell Power by 40% for 6 seconds.

talents.name: ValeeraSinisterStrikeSealFate
talents.title: Seal Fate
talents.description: Sinister Strike deals 50% additional damage and generates an additional Combo Point when used against Silenced, Rooted, or Stunned enemy Heroes.

talents.name: ValeeraAmbushAssassinate
talents.title: Assassinate
talents.description: Ambush deals 50% additional damage and reduces the target's Armor by an additional 10 if no other enemy Heroes are within 4 range of the victim.

talents.name: ValeeraThistleTea
talents.title: Thistle Tea
talents.description: Activate to instantly restore 100 Energy.  Activating Thistle Tea does not break Stealth.

talents.name: ValeeraSmokeBombAdrenalineRush
talents.title: Adrenaline Rush
talents.description: While in the Smoke Bomb, Valeera regenerates an additional 40 Energy per second.

talents.name: ValeeraCloakOfShadowsEnvelopingShadows
talents.title: Enveloping Shadows
talents.description: Whenever Valeera uses Vanish, she also gains Cloak of Shadows.

talents.name: ValeeraGarroteRupture
talents.title: Rupture
talents.description: Increase Garrote's damage over time by 100%. Valeera's Basic Attacks refresh the duration of Garrote.

talents.name: ValeeraVanishElusiveness
talents.title: Elusiveness
talents.description: Increases Valeera's Movement Speed while Vanished by an additional 20%.
